welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hasbrouck Heights, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy our quaint shops, delicious restaurants, and friendly community during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport is reserved for private and charter flights only.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of services for passengers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Municipal Airport serves as a hub for regional flights and offers a comfortable waiting area for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the private jet terminal at Municipal Airport offers luxury amenities and services, including a VIP lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary wifi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
